source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_00<tab>Runar lets out a sigh of relief.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_00<tab>スリザーバウのルナルは、命名石を受け取って嬉しそうだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_01<tab>With Toddia's heartstone safely returned to Runar, the Night's Blessed are able to proceed with her funeral service. To show his appreciation for your efforts, he insists that you and your comrades attend the service as honored guests. He then asks you to inform the others while he sees to preparations.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_01<tab>ルナルから、葬儀への参加を提案された。スリザーバウの「ミンフィリア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_02<tab>You find Minfilia telling Thancred of your recent undertaking in the woods. She is delighted by their invitation, and promises not to be late. With Y'shtola and Urianger toiling away to decipher the tablet, you decide not to disturb them and make for the Darker.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_02<tab>ミンフィリアを葬儀に誘った。スリザーバウの至暗所にいる「物静かな老婆」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_03<tab>In the dimly lit cave you find an elderly woman you believe to be the attendant Runar spoke of. Without saying a word she hands you a candle, and points to a spot on the floor close by.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_03<tab>老婆から、ロウソクを渡された。至暗所の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB0F01 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E7201 /var>」を置こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_04<tab>Seeing the cluster of candles there on the floor, you place yours among them, and the attendant nods and smiles in answer. It would appear you have done your part in preparing for the service. All you can do now is wait for it to begin.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_04<tab>ロウソクを設置した。至暗所の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB1001 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_05<tab>Before long, a procession of mourners enter the Darker. Among them you find Y'shtola and Urianger, who have taken a reprieve from working to pay their respects. They join you in the rear of the chamber, and a hush soon falls over the room. Runar then enters taking his place at the Font of Seeing, and delivers a moving service in memory of Toddia. As the room clears, Y'shtola invites you to her chambers to discuss the tablet.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_05<tab>トッディアの葬儀を見届けた。スリザーバウの「ヤ・シュトラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_06<tab>Y'shtola has finished deciphering the tablet and is prepared to reveal her findings. It will not be long before you track down the Lightwarden.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SEQ_06<tab>ヤ・シュトラと話した。彼女は、石板の解読結果を披露してくれるようだ。闇の戦士たちは、大罪喰いのもとへと辿りつくことができるのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_TODO_02<tab>Place the candle at the destination.

target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_005<tab>……なんだ、そのバツの悪そうな顔は。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_010<tab>Words fail to express my gratitude for this kindness you have done for the Blessed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_010あんたたちも無事だったし、
こうしてトッディアの命名石も見つかった。
これで、心置きなく彼女の葬儀が執り行えるよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_011<tab>I must insist you and your friends attend Toddia's service as honored guests.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_011よければ、あんたたちも参列してくれないか？
この石を見つけてくれた人となれば、
遺族も、「夜の民」の仲間たちも喜ぶはずさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_012<tab>There is still much we must do to prepare, but please go and inform the others it will be held in the Darker.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_012……じゃあ、オイラは葬儀の支度をしてくるよ。
あんたは是非、ミンフィリアにも声をかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_013<tab>When you arrive, there should be an attendant present to explain the proceedings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_013葬儀は、南側にある「至暗所」で行われる。
中に誰かしらいると思うから、
声をかければ、参列の案内をしてくれるはずさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I learned so much about the Night's Blessed while you were away.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_020サンクレッド、おかえりなさい。
あの……あのね、私、スリザーバウのみなさんから、
「夜の民」について教えてもらいました……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_021<tab>And we helped them recover a lost heirloom out in the woods. I know I wasn't supposed to leave, but they really needed our help! There were sin eaters, and─
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_021それから、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんと一緒に、
罪喰いを退治して、遺品の回収を……。
勝手に出歩いてしまったけれど、でも……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_022<tab>As long as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> accompanied you. But do try to be more careful. Your injuries could have been a lot worse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_022……そいつと一緒なら、構いはしないさ。
ただ、怪我の手当はしっかりしておけ。
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_023<tab>えっ……どうして怪我したってわかったんですか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_024<tab>Let's just say a little bird told me. And it's telling me now that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has business with us.
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_024<tab>それよりも、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が用事みたいだぞ。

TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_025ご、ごめんなさい……！
何か、ご用だったでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_026<tab>They've asked us to attend the service?
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_026<tab>トッディアさんの葬儀に参列……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_027<tab>Of course we'll go. It's being held in the Darker, is it? We'll take care not to be late, I promise.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_027わかりました、お邪魔でないならば、
是非、参加させてもらおうと思います。
時間になったら「至暗所」に行きますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_030<tab>It's such a relief to know everything is going as planned. I'll join you in the Darker shortly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_030ちゃんとした形で葬儀が行えるようになったのなら、
私も嬉しいです……！
時間になったら「至暗所」に行きますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_035<tab>Between your earlier excursion and my patrol of the area for sin eaters, hopefully Y'shtola and Urianger will be able to finish their work in peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_035こいつに付き合ってくれて、ありがとな。
有象無象の罪喰いはこっちで対処しておいたから、
しばらくは、石板の解読が妨げられるようなこともないだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>The elderly woman hands you a candle. She then points over at a nearby corner where you might place it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_SYSTEM_000_041物静かな老婆から、「」を手渡された。
これを供えて待てと言いたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_060<tab>Hopefully Y'shtola has good news to share.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_060……まさか、こいつがあんなはっきりと、
目標を語るようになるなんてな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_061<tab>A chance to reclaim the night has lit a fire in Minfilia that I would see kindled.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_THANCRED_000_061せっかくその気になってるんだ、
魔女マトーヤ様からの有意義な情報とやらを、
聞かせてもらうとしようぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_065<tab>What do you suppose she's gleaned from the tablet?
target: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RYNE_000_065<tab>あの石板から、いったいどんなことが……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_URIANGER_000_070<tab>I have no doubt thou wilt find the contents of the tablet most informative.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_URIANGER_000_070スリザーバウの散策、よい息抜きになったようですね。
では、私たちの成果も、ご報告するといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_075<tab>I had no right to involve you in our troubles. Still, without your help, today's service would not have been possible. The Night's Blessed are in your debt.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_RUNAR_000_075あんたたちのおかげで、無事、
トッディアの命を、天の暗き海に還すことができた。
危険なことに巻き込んで悪かったよ……でも、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>Good, you're here. Thanks to the Exarch's <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var>, our next course of action is now clear.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMC107_03328_YSHTOLA_000_080……そろったわね。
それじゃあ、ここまでの石板の解読結果を、
あなたたちにも共有するわ。
